titleStmt.title: New-England. Or A briefe enarration of the ayre, earth, water, fish and fowles of that country With a description of the natures, orders, habits, and religion of the natiues; in Latine and English verse.
titleStmt.author: Morrell, William, fl. 1625.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
